title: Honor level
body:
Hi, 
I've been punished for flaming and feeding, which concluded me to be dishonorable (level 0), after some time I got a notification about being promoted to honor level 1, even got  a couple of key fragments for keeping it sportsmanlike, but yet when I go to my profile it shows that I'm dishonorable. Does anyone know is it a bug or I've been punished again, even tho I haven't been notificated about it  nor got any restriction.

replies.body: Hey there! Would you mind taking a screenshot of exactly what you're seeing? Would love to get vision on it and see exactly what's going on with your honor.
Pretty sure he just needs to restart his League Client for his profile page to update, happened to me when I went from honor level 2 to 3 and now its perfectly fine!
